   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(maybe_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   24:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   25: -export([basic/1, nested/1, in_try_catch/1]).
   26: 
   27: all() ->
   28:     [{group,p}].
   29: 
   30: groups() ->
   31:     [{p,[parallel],
   32:       [basic,nested,in_try_catch]}].
   33: 
   34: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   35:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   36:     Config.
   37: 
   38: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   39:     ok.
   40: 
   41: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   43:     true = lists:member(?MODULE, int:interpreted()),
   44:     Config.
   45: 
   46: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   47:     ok.
   48: 
   49: -record(value, {v}).
   50: 
   51: basic(_Config) ->
   52:     {ok,42,fish} = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {ok,fish}}),
   53:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {error,whatever}}),
   54:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => error}),
   55:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => error}),
   56:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {error,whatever}}),
   57:     some_value = basic_1(0, #{0 => #value{v=some_value}}),
   58:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,something_wrong},[_|_]}} = catch basic_1(0, #{0 => something_wrong}),
   59: 
   60:     {ok,life,"universe",everything} = basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   61:                                                    life => "universe",
   62:                                                    "universe" => {ok,everything}}),
   63:     error = basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   64:                          life => "universe",
   65:                          "universe" => error}),
   66:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,not_a_list},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   67:                                                                 life => not_a_list}),
   68:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,not_ok},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   69:                                                                life => "universe",
   70:                                                                "universe" => not_ok}),
   71:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,not_ok},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => not_ok}),
   72: 
   73:     {ok,42,fish,dolphins} = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {ok,fish},
   74:                                          fish => {ok,#value{v=dolphins}}}),
   75:     {error,whatever} = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {error,whatever}}),
   76:     failed = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => failed}),
   77:     failed_early = basic_3(0, #{0 => failed_early}),
   78: 
   79:     y = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else _ -> y end,
   80:     y = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else _ -> x, y end,
   81: 
   82:     x = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else E1 -> E1 end,
   83: 
   84:     6 = maybe X1 = 2+2, X1+2 end,
   85:     6 = maybe X2 = 2+2, X2+2 else {error, T} -> T end,
   86:     {"llo", "hello", "hello"} = maybe Y1 = "he"++X3=Z1 ?= "hello", {X3,Y1,Z1} end,
   87:     {"llo", "hello", "llo"} = maybe Y2 = "he"++(X4=Z2) ?= "hello", {X4,Y2,Z2} end,
   88: 
   89:     whatever = maybe
   90:                    AlwaysMatching ?= id(whatever),
   91:                    AlwaysMatching
   92:                else
   93:                    E2 -> E2
   94:                end,
   95: 
   96:     <<0>> = basic_4(id({<<0>>})),
   97: 
   98:     ok.
   99: 
  100: basic_1(V0, M) ->
  101:     Res = basic_1a(V0, M),
  102:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_1b(V0, M),
  103:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_1c(V0, M),
  104:     Res.
  105: 
  106: basic_1a(V0, M) ->
  107:     maybe
  108:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  109:         {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  110:         {ok,V1,V2}
  111:     else
  112:         {error,_} ->
  113:             error;
  114:         error ->
  115:             error;
  116:         #value{v=V} ->
  117:             V
  118:     end.
  119: 
  120: basic_1b(V0, M) ->
  121:     Result =
  122:         maybe
  123:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  124:             {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  125:             {ok,V1,V2}
  126:         else
  127:             {error,_} ->
  128:                 error;
  129:             error ->
  130:                 error;
  131:             #value{v=V} ->
  132:                 V
  133:         end,
  134:     {wrapped,Result}.
  135: 
  136: basic_1c(V0, M) ->
  137:     OK = id(ok),
  138:     Error = id(error),
  139:     Result =
  140:         maybe
  141:             {OK,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  142:             {OK,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  143:             {OK,V1,V2}
  144:         else
  145:             {Error,_} ->
  146:                 Error;
  147:             Error ->
  148:                 Error;
  149:             #value{v=V} ->
  150:                 V
  151:         end,
  152:     {wrapped,Result}.
  153: 
  154: basic_2(V0, M) ->
  155:     Res = basic_2a(V0, M),
  156:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_2b(V0, M),
  157:     Res.
  158: 
  159: basic_2a(V0, M) ->
  160:     maybe
  161:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  162:         V2 = [_|_] = do_something(V1, M),
  163:         {ok,V3} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  164:         {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  165:     else
  166:         {error,_} ->
  167:             error;
  168:         error ->
  169:             error;
  170:         #value{v=V} ->
  171:             V
  172:     end.
  173: 
  174: basic_2b(V0, M) ->
  175:     Result =
  176:         maybe
  177:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  178:             V2 = [_|_] = do_something(V1, M),
  179:             {ok,V3} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  180:             {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  181:         else
  182:             {error,_} ->
  183:                 error;
  184:             error ->
  185:                 error;
  186:             #value{v=V} ->
  187:                 V
  188:         end,
  189:     _ = id(0),
  190:     {wrapped,Result}.
  191: 
  192: basic_3(V0, M) ->
  193:     Res = basic_3a(V0, M),
  194:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_3b(V0, M),
  195:     Res.
  196: 
  197: basic_3a(V0, M) ->
  198:     maybe
  199:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  200:         {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  201:         {ok,#value{v=V3}} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  202:         {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  203:     end.
  204: 
  205: basic_3b(V0, M) ->
  206:     Result =
  207:         maybe
  208:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  209:             {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  210:             {ok,#value{v=V3}} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  211:             {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  212:         end,
  213:     {wrapped,Result}.
  214: 
  215: basic_4({X}) ->
  216:     maybe
  217:         <<_:(ok)>> ?= X
  218:     end.
  219: 
  220: nested(_Config) ->
  221:     {outer_fail,not_ok} = nested_1(0, #{0 => not_ok}),
  222:     {x,{error,inner}} = nested_1(0, #{0 => {ok,x}, x => {error,inner}}),
  223:     {outer_fail,{unexpected,not_error}} = nested_1(0, #{0 => {ok,x}, x => not_error}),
  224:     ok.
  225: 
  226: nested_1(V0, M) ->
  227:     Res = nested_1a(V0, M),
  228:     {wrapped,Res} = nested_1b(V0, M),
  229:     {wrapped,Res} = nested_1c(V0, M),
  230:     Res.
  231: 
  232: nested_1a(V0, M) ->
  233:     maybe
  234:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  235:         V2 = {error,_} ?=
  236:             maybe
  237:                 {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  238:             else
  239:                 Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  240:             end,
  241:         {V1,V2}
  242:     else
  243:         Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  244:     end.
  245: 
  246: nested_1b(V0, M) ->
  247:     Result =
  248:         maybe
  249:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  250:             V2 = {error,_} ?=
  251:                 maybe
  252:                     {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  253:                 else
  254:                     Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  255:                 end,
  256:             {V1,V2}
  257:         else
  258:             Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  259:         end,
  260:     {wrapped,Result}.
  261: 
  262: nested_1c(V0, M) ->
  263:     Result =
  264:         maybe
  265:             R ?= maybe
  266:                      {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  267:                      {error,_} = V2 ?=
  268:                          maybe
  269:                              {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  270:                          else
  271:                              Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  272:                          end,
  273:                      {V1,V2}
  274:                  else
  275:                      Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  276:                  end,
  277:             R
  278:         else
  279:             Var -> Var
  280:         end,
  281:     {wrapped,Result}.
  282: 
  283: in_try_catch(_Config) ->
  284:     Ref = make_ref(),
  285:     try
  286:         in_try_catch_1(Ref),
  287:         ct:failed(should_not_succeed)
  288:     catch
  289:         {bad_maybe_match,Ref} ->
  290:             ok
  291:     end.
  292: 
  293: in_try_catch_1(Ref) ->
  294:     maybe
  295:         throw({bad_maybe_match,Ref})
  296:     end.
  297: 
  298: %% Utility functions.
  299: 
  300: do_something(V, M) ->
  301:     map_get(id(V), M).
  302: 
  303: id(X) -> X.
